website_summaries.verdict: This stylish kids’ recliner offers a great balance of sleek sophistication for parents and cozy comfort for little ones. Easily the best kids’ chair on the market right now.
pros: Attractive design blends well with existing furniture and won't detract from living room decor
Quality construction is solid and sturdy
Faux leather is soft yet durable
Armrest cup holder is a nice touch
cons: Most kids will likely outgrow it by age 6

website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, it's an adorable and practical design for children that's also quite affordable.
pros: This child-sized chair works like a standard recliner
Child-friendly features include soft padding, cup holder, and easy-to-clean upholstery
cons: Somewhat difficult to recline, especially for very small children
Owners voice a few concerns about durability

customer_reviews.title: Should include age range
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very small my 5 year old hangs off and it doesn't stay in recline motion
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Logan

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are so worth it! My girls love them. My youngest of 3 yrs is what I call a roughien. She is so rough with every thing. Pleasingly, the chairs have withheld her abuse. These chairs definitely obtain the 3 big factors Mom's look for; Looks great and adds to the room decor , doesn't stain which makes them easy to clean & the kiddo's love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: kimberley ray

customer_reviews.title: Not really happy with the chair
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with the chair. Way to small for a 4 year old. The back needs to be taller. It's really hard to recline. My son has actually fallen over trying to do it. I wish I could return but I threw away the box. I would say it's good for a 1-2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Janeway

customer_reviews.title: Its nice. Just be careful
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail today, It looks so so adorable. Took 1 minute to get everything together. A little problem I have is the recline and leg rest. The leg rest, is not like regular recliner that stays in place when put up. So my 17 month old, within 5 mins of sitting in the chair got a bump in her head because she fell face first when making the mistake of stepping on the recline, that goes down if more weight is put into it. After the bump, lesson learned, do not put up the recline and leg rest. But the chair itself as a chair is nice.
customer_reviews.author: The Mom Mess

customer_reviews.title: Lift a Little Difficult, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 yro son for Christmas and he loves it. The cup holder is tight enough to hold most cups and bottles without them being knocked out easily. The chair went together in about 2 minutes. Might take two people to hold pieces together to install. Good quality material, we have a puppy who jumps on it and so far there are no scratches! The lift doesn't go up easily my son has to really force it leaning back or the easier solution is i just pull up the end for him. That's why i gave 4 stars. Given that this is a kids item it should be easier for kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: CThrasher

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the product is good and now thing is wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them. One for each child. I did have difficulty with shipping and delivery. The first time I attempted to buy two of them one of my orders got cancelled and I had to rebuy my second one. You can imagine how devastated it was for a two year old who had to wait four more days to get her own. Otherwise the product is good and now thing is wrong with it. I have a 6 year old who is on the shorter side and she is to big for these chairs...was hoping they were bigger but they will work for my young kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sons second birthday. I would suggest this for ages 0-6 years. Any older and I'd say the chair would be too little. My 5 year old niece fits in it however the back rest does not support her head. It's hard to recline but he doesn't really prefer it reclined. I purchased the white color and it's a true white which matches really well with our decor. It's super easy and quick to assemble. Easy clean up since it is a faux leather. I would definitely recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Darby

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old LOVES his chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very nice and was very easy to put together. My son is 3 years and have enough room to grow into. I strongly believe he have another two more years of not more with chair. Yess this chair is very sturdy and strong. My son have flip and flop ALL over this chair and the chair have held on strong. Not once flipping over. The only thing to keep in mind is that you will have to pull out the chair when they want to recline. My son can not recline in the chair by himself. I truly don’t think you can recline by yourself in this chair. Other then that great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Aleea

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!  Only reason for 3 stars.....
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great chair. I love the cup holder! Only reason I am giving it 3 stars is because it is so difficult to recline! I literally have to hold it and push it back with my foot!!!! No child will easily climb into this chair and recline. Otherwise- its a very nice piece of furniture that you can wipe off! Bought as a gift for my Niece- so I can't comment on how it will wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny E.

customer_reviews.title: Warning to parents!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this chair for my two-and-a-half-year-old son. We had it 3 days and his leg got caught in the foot reclining mechanism as it closed and his body was projected over his leg onto the ground while his leg was still caught in the chair and he broke his leg. The chair itself is cute but I'm very weary of using it now. Please just be careful if you have an active young child they probably should not be using this chair quite yet. I believe there is an age range suggested and I should have followed it. :(
customer_reviews.author: SaraMac1

customer_reviews.title: Good value has some flaws but ok with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get it. My son loves it. It’s right next to my chair. It is very light. Put together in less than 7 minutes. It doesn’t seem to stay reclined. If he moves the legs go down immediately without pressure. Also There is not lever or switch so I have to recline it for him. It almost tipped over while he was pushing his back into The back piece it to make it recline. Good value for the money. But probably have to upgrade next year. I’ll see how football season goes and revise my review if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeTime

customer_reviews.title: Leather = Easy Clean Up
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as gifts for two youngest grandchildren. Thought hard between fabric or leather. After first day of the youngest one drooling all over it - I was definitely glad we got the leather. The other one is in the process of "potty training". No accidents in chair - yet. They love them. Looks nice with other furniture in their living room. Was very easy to assemble back onto the chair. Everything else is assembled. I did it myself, even though it does say two people.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lamartiniere

customer_reviews.title: Recliner just like daddy
customer_reviews.text: Was a day late but now that I have it I could care less it’s exactly as described! I love the dark rich brown color I was nervous it would be lighter. It was very easy to put together I didn’t even need the directions that’s how easy it was! Feels very solid well made I’m sure it will last unti my daughter outgrows it. Now she has a recliner just like daddy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.cone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Montana
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed, the seat of this chair is considerably smaller than the seat of another child recliner I have. For me it doesn't matter too much because this chair is for my 2 year old grandson, and the other chair (purchased elsewhere & different brand) is for my four year old granddaughter. However; because it says it will hold up to 90# I purchased it thinking my grandson would have several year of use, because he could use it now but still grow into it. However with the seat being so small I don't see how a 90# child would fit in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little chair for toddlers. My 19 month old sits in this chair to watch Moana and whatever else she likes to watch. Its easy to clean let alone put together. Durable too. She's kinda rough climbing all over the chair and its yet to get scratched up or ripped. I would buy it again. The only thing I have an issue with is that the leg rest doesn't fully hold itself up. It falls easily with very little weight.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: WAY smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: While it is a super cute and well made chair, the dimensions listed in the picture are completely wrong. It says it’s supposed to be 36 tall by 27 wide by 24 deep but it really is only 25 tall by 21 wide by 17 deep.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Zulewski

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PIECE of CHILD'S FURNITURE!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this recliner for my grandson for Christmas. It is the cutest thing. He makes it recline while he is standing in front of it and then he tries to crawl in it with it reclined. Needless to say, the chair closes before he can crawl in it.😁 He sits in it for only a few minutes at a time, but it has nothing to do with the chair. He is just a busy guy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy build.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for Great-grandsons. They love them. Packaging was very sturdy. Assembly extremely simple (Screw on four legs, chair-back has guides that lock onto mechanism.j Two and a half year-old boy has no trouble reclining. Even uses foot rest to hide his Thomas trains from his eight-month old brother. Little brother thinks he's a hot shot when he sits in his chair. Older boy now lets dad sit in the big chair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair
customer_reviews.text: The color looks more coral in the picture and in person it is a soft baby pink but I am still giving it 5 stars because it is the cutest chair and very sturdy... I am sitting in it now as I am typing and it is very soft and sturdy... my 1 year old daughter is going to love this so much, she's obsessed with chairs and now she has one of her very own!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrific but my kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves it so far. I only gave it 3 stars because it smells SUPER BAD taking it out of the box. It smells like a farm. I’m sure the smell will disappear over time but it’s been a few hours and it’s very strong still. I also don’t like that there is no lever or button for recline. It’s too difficult for kiddos this young to push back and do on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who is 3. Set up was supper easy one person can do it. Cup holder is perfect for his chocolate milk. Fabric is easy to clean in case of a spill. He finds it hard to push back and recline but nothing we can help him with. My mother in law sat in it she’s about 150lbs and it did not brake luckily lol my son just really wanted her to sit in it. I like it, he likes it and enjoys it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Brown Color Upholstery Falsely Advertised As Real Leather
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these in the brown color because it (and the black color) was advertised as being "Brown LeatherSoft Upholstery". LeatherSoft is a high quality brand of bonded leather. I was very disappointed when what I received was just low quality plastic upholstery. I informed them of the error via their web site and they did not even respond. Order from someone else, someone you can trust.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.text: The cupholder is amazing. The faux leather is amazing and easy to wipe off. My kids LOVE their chairs! My son is huge (100th percentile for height and weight)for a 3 yr old and it fits him comfortably. He'll probably outgrow this by 4 if not before. My daughter who is much smaller and is 1.5 will more than likely have it for a lot longer. The seat is very sturdy and well made and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son as it has very good review. The product itself does have a quality feel, looks good. With only one big drawback for us, it is too small for my 5 years old. The product description doesn't mention any size. The title includes kids which mean it is should be good for kids, but it is actually only big enough for toddler. I regretted that I didn't read other people's review before I buy it. Anyway, I'll keep it for my forthcoming baby.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and classy without spending a fortune!
customer_reviews.text: So cute and comfy for my little one. It’s just the right size for a toddler. It’s small and light enough to move and place anywhere; but it’s big enough to add some personality to the room and allow your child to feel like a big kid. No more plastic chairs and bean bags. Let’s be a little more sophisticated! 5 Stars across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple one and it is so beautiful....a muted, matte shade...........and soooooo soft. My grandson is about 42 inches tall...wears 4T-5T and has plenty of room now and for the future.....I am glad I bought the " little man" his own chair..love seeing sitting in it watching cartoons with his blanket across legs......makes my heart smile
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for my little one!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I looked at many different recliners for my 4yr old and this one looked promising. The chair came today and my son loves it. He’s sitting in it and said it looks like Mommy’s chair... I’m happy that this chair meets all expectations of my hubby and other children also... Great investment for our little one... his recliner looks great with the other recliners in the living room. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Petdan27

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: My one year old (almost 2) loves this chair. It is easy to essemble and sturdy. However, the fake leather gets ruined very easily. The color is already chipping off since I bought it a few months ago and she doesn't use it daily or unsupervised. Love the cupholder feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Jayde

customer_reviews.title: Leather like fabric cracks after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute chair but the Leather like fabric cracked after only 2 months. Got it for Christmas and we didn't even put it together until mid-Jan. and it's cracking in spots that aren't even used; like on the corners. The chair sits in the middle of the room and is not used but maybe 2 or 3 times a week if that. We only have one 2 yr. old that is very gentle with her stuff. It's for children, I would think the fabric would be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Norton

customer_reviews.title: Good chair with a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: Chair looks great and great quality my 3 year old loves it. BUT my 3 year old is not able to recline the chair by herself unless she pulls the foot out before sitting and I do think if she stood on the back of the chair it would fall backwards. I am keeping in hopes she can learn how to recline on her own since she really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair! Bought it in the chocolate brown as a Christmas present for my 18 month old. He loves it, as soon as it was assembled he put his sippy cup in the cup holder and climbed up to sit down. The material is good quality for the price. The only down side is the chair isn't a little wider. Also, it was a little hard to screw one on the legs, but it went on with a little force...other than that no major complaints...love the chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: Super little chair. We bought two, one for my 6year old, and the other for a 3 year old. Perfect for the little guy with some room to grow. For the 6 year old it may be a bit too small. Her head stick above the top. Still usable, but not for long. Quality of the build is pretty good. Fabric seems pretty durable, kids haven't ripped it in the first week just yet. Overall we really like this as an addition to our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Cutest chair ever!
customer_reviews.text: My sons LOVE this recliner! They love to sit in and snack while watching a movie before bed. It is so cute and they are comfortable and cozy and not making a mess on my furniture! My sons are 1 and 2 and are able to get in and out of the chair with ease and sit comfortably! Also cleans easily with a wipe which is very kid friendly! Worth the price for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Berke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my 2 year old granddaughter. Its PERFECT size for her and will last her for years to come. Easy to assemble and its super padded/comfy. The cup holder is a nice bonus and can hold her little snacks too. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Debby Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Tips backwards easily.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. They have to be reclined before they are sat in. They also tip backwards easily. My daughter has fallen backwards several times. Just trying to push the foot rest down to get out of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price we paid which was around the vicinity of 89. We also had a gift card which made it cheaper for us personally. It's a really great chair and looks rather luxurious for a toddler chair. I would be a little disappointed if I purchased the chair for my son if her were older than maybe 3? I can't imagine this chair being comfortable for a 5year old or older. The back could be a little taller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Majors fam trio

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 2 year old son - He loves it and he fits in it perfectly! I love that it has a cup holder! We have it sitting in our living room and he always puts his drink cup in there -- which is nice for me because it means its not spilling anywhere!!! It does recline but he hasn't figured out how to do it by himself yet. He just prefers to sit in the upright position. Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Good my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 1 and 3 year old. I think they are good for ages 1 to 5 for the size of the recliner. Honestly, I probably wouldn't have even bought one for my bigger 3 year old. She really is almost getting too big for it. I didn't want them fighting over it. So, I bought 2. One came a day earlier than the other. I set it up. They were fighting like hell to both sit on it. I'm glad we only had one day of fighting the other came the very next day.
customer_reviews.author: M. ggranville

customer_reviews.title: The recliner is worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We liked having colors to chose from so each granddaughter had their favorite color! The cup holder is a hit! It's larger than cheaper ones so they can use longer, they are 3 & 5! Shipping was on time. Set up easy! The girls have learned to pull the foot rest out before climbing into it, that's the only downfall til they get older/stronger to sit in it to recline. Too bad the purple cost more than the pink!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Recline easily at all
customer_reviews.text: My son cant recline this by himself, I have to push on the top of the back piece for it to recline, my son is only 5, he loves it b/c he has a chair like daddies but i'm kinda pissed i spent this much on something that hardly reclines and cant stay reclined?..... wont be buying my next piece of furniture from these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Steven rice

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable. Do not purchase for a child over 3
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it came already assembled! Matches my other furniture, that is also a plus. However, it’s super hard. I give comfort 2 starts. My child has sat in it once since Christmas. the recliner does not stay in place. I have to place a pillow underneath So that when the leg rest start to give, the pillow catches it. It’s super tiny, even for my 3year old. My child will outgrow it by next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Yonce

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Very still and hard. We figured since it looked to be good quality it would also be comfortable but wasn’t the case my son has a cheaper one from ATWOODS he chooses over this one everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Khristopher Karson Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute toddlers chair
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old enjoys watching his movies in his chair. Although, he is tall. I wouldn’t recommend for taller toddlers. He’s probably out grow this in the next couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Stubzie1

customer_reviews.title: Problems with assembly, a stripped out nut.
customer_reviews.text: The chair came in this past Saturday. My grand daughter was very excited. I unpacked carefully and followed the directions. I started putting the chair legs twisting it into the screw mounts under the chair. The first 3 went in no problem but the last one was stripped. It took me over 1 hour to do a fix for the plastic screw in leg would hold. So far the chair is holding up well but didn't like the additional time to fix something that should not have been broken in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement chair for my 5yr old. This chair is so easy to assemble and is great! The reclining is perfect and great for for movie watching time on the tablet. The material on the chair makes for easy cleaning as you can simply wipe off with wet cloth.
customer_reviews.author: BabyLuv

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 yr old grandson. He loves it! The only problem I had was that one of the legs won't stay on. The screw hole for the leg is bigger than the screw that goes in it. I tried putting glue on the screw and then attaching it. It worked for awhile but everytime the chair is moved the leg falls off again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylorsville gal

customer_reviews.title: Over a year and still like new
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little niece and after a year of having it, contrary to many reports the chair is sturdy like a rock to the point that many full weight adults will sit it in for jokes sake and has never had any issues of falling apart or breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First the foot test doesn’t stay up , the arm rest are to low and child can fall no safe at all quality is ok but pricey for what it is ! I expected more from the way it was built !!!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far, it is still in very good condition even though my three year old son uses and abuses it everyday. He climbs on it, turns it over, spills food and drinks on it, and soils it with his sticky little hands. Yet, it’s easy to clean and has not torn. He’s had for six months already. The best part is that it looks good and matches our other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: 1 YEAR OLD GRANDSON LOVES CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little chair for my 1 year old gradson. I spent a hour looking at all the different kid recliner chairs on Amazon, and was worried that it wouldn't be good quality with such a good price. My son just texted me a picture of my grandson in the chair. He LOVES it! My son says the leather is better quality than his recliner. I'm a happy grandma with my decision to purchase this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Spain

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this little recliner for our grandson and now he has a chair to lounge in just like daddy's! It's absolutely perfect! Brown leather just like dad's and reclines fairly easy with a little help. And the drink holder was the perfect touch!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Easily tumps over, grandson fell off the back of it .doesn't set even on the carpet
customer_reviews.author: Robin Cissell

customer_reviews.title: Chair is cute, BUT WAY TO SMALL!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my 2 year old grandson, and he's a small lil guy for 2.. And his head comes up over the back of the chair when he is sitting up in it. Not happy at all, as he is not comfortable in it! I would def go with the next size up Otherwise the chair is great,
customer_reviews.author: Jacque R

customer_reviews.title: Cup holder broken
customer_reviews.text: The cup holder isn’t secured and pops right out, revealing the inner fabric. I noticed it as soon as we got it and my two year old was able to pop it out the same day we gave it to him. For the price, I’m a little disappointed at this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice for SMALLER Kids
customer_reviews.text: Nice Recliner for SMALLER Kids. Bought 2 ---One for the 3 year old & one for the 7 year old....I would Say this is good up to 4-5 yrs of age---its a small for a 6-7 year old....Little pricey as well....Was Packaged well, & easy to put the two piece together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair - order, order!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got the chair last night but so far my 2.5 yr old LOVES his grown up chair. It was incredibly easy to put together, basically three parts - the feet go on the base, the base, and then insert the back onto the base - done! The only thing I'd like to see differently is it doesn't recline easily. I have to help him with transitioning the chair into positions (recline and up-right). Otherwise it's a WONDERFUL chair and would recommend it. Came surprisingly fast considering it was sent to Alaska - came in under a week.
customer_reviews.author: RetailTherapy

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We now have 3 of these as each princess "needs" one. They match perfect with our couch which is why we originally got the first one. Love the cup holder feature and that it reclines. It wipes down easy. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: 4 princesses

customer_reviews.title: Shipment may be missing items
customer_reviews.text: Chair came in a box containing main section and the back section. Instructions had only one installation step - to install the four legs to the main section. The legs were not included in the shipment. I had to fashion legs myself. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R.

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair for our, then, 3 year old for Christmas 2019. It took her some time to learn how to get the foot rest up, but anytime she moves, it closes back. She is now 4 & has almost out grown it, we haven’t even had it a year yet. It’s great for her to have her own space to sit, but she’d still rather sit in one of our chairs than her own. If it wasn’t a “Santa” gift, we probably would have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda J Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, like a real recliner but make sure you check the size of chair and your child
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very nice and good quality. Easy to clean material. The only that is a little hard for my daughter is pushing the back of the chair back to recline but overall real nice and good quality. Side note: my daughter just turn 6 this month and she is about 4ft maybe 50 or 60lbs. She fits good weight wise but a little tall/ long for the chair but she still loves it. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: treena

customer_reviews.title: smell is very strong
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 1 yr old. Very easy to clean & assemble the back part without any tools but it does have a very strong unpleasant smell that obviously its been packaged for a very long time so hopefully the smell will clear out within a couple days. I will update later on about the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for kids under 10 (if they are small)
customer_reviews.text: Good chair for kids under 10 (if they are small). The size is a little smaller than expected but still not bad for the kids. The cup holder is a little small and the recliner function isn't great but this is comparing it to an adult style chair. For kids, it is a decent chair at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Welch

customer_reviews.title: This is so perfect for my kiddos
customer_reviews.text: No instructions to put together but it literally took longer to get out of the box than it did to put together. This is so perfect for my kiddos. Great looking quality and very plush!! My daughter loves that she has her own seat like her brothers! Very very excited! (It's the one with the cup holder) it looks so much nicer than the one we bought through someone else.
customer_reviews.author: JLCrews

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for years and have held up nicely. If my cats didn't scratch them they would still look new. My kids love them. Fall asleep in them, watch TV, play video games you name it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Collier

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS EASY TO ASSEMBLE KID'S COUCH
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE THIS COUCH! They are only 2.5yrs old and my husband and I have to help them with the actual recliner party of the couch, but they enjoy having their very own couch. I would recommend. It was also very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C

customer_reviews.title: Won't regret purchasing this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy , perfect for our two year old son. It is easy to clean and light enough to move if need be. If you are debating which chair to get for your child, this is it! The color is great and it has held up our rambunctious two year old! It reclines very easily and our son absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren and Donald

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kids Recliner
customer_reviews.text: 18 month old grandson loves his new recliner! Quality seems decent for the money. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: auggie

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This chair is absolutely adorable!!! My son loves it. Right when my husband opened the box to put it together (2 piece assembly, simple) my son was all over it. He knew exactly where to put his juice cup. It may take him a while to figure out how to recline it (being he's only 15 months old), but with the quality of the cushioned seat, this should last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Quela

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this product is there isn't a handle to raise the recliner. My four year old has to put up the recliner before she sure down and then when she sits down the recliner goes down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Adorable personalizable chairs for kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my granddaughter who are 18 months and going on 4. They love them. Have a removable head rest cover that I took to a local embroidery shop to have personalized. Saved me more than $30 a chair this way. Only issue with the chairs is the kids can’t really recline without help and they don’t stay reclined welll.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little chair. It works well As far as reclining goes. I do, however, think the back of the chair should be a little taller. The color is true to the pictures and I will be buying for all of my kids once they are old enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley55

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Our two year old received this as a Christmas gift because we have an adult size recliner that matches. She loves being able to “look just like the big folks” in her chair. So far we have found it to be durable, easy to clean and sturdy for toddler wear-and-tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Very small. Bought this for my 3 year old. He's not big, and I doubt he'll get much use from this. The foot rest collapses very easily, so it's hard to keep it up while he's in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mekarri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually seen the chair in person, shipped as a gift. Perfect size for our 21-lb 1-year-old grandchild. She's big for her age, but this chair is absolutely perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: For almost 100 dollars, I would expect better construction or more comfort. We purchased this for my 3 year old. He's 40 pounds and 40 inches. It fits him, but it's not something he's comfortable sitting or reclining in. He mostly just pushes it and uses it to climb on things. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: $am n €had

customer_reviews.title: What I liked about this chair
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this chair, was the quality of it. It is very durable and is easy to keep clean. The thing I dislike about it is the seat is not deep enough. When the kids sit in it the are as high as the arm rest. For instance, when my 2 year old grandson fell asleep in the chair, I had to put pillows around the chair bc if he was to roll over he would have fell right out of the chair bc he was even with the arm rest. Just wish the seat was deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you !
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning the chair as it was too small for our 7 year old. But otherwise it was a nice chair for ages 2-4 years old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... correctly so I returned it and they were very nice and friendly about the return and everything went smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought both of my grand babies one for Christmas when we received them one of them didn’t recline correctly so I returned it and they were very nice and friendly about the return and everything went smooth and a replacement was shipped quickly and it worked great. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Good but thin leather
customer_reviews.text: Love the color my baby girl loves this she is 16 mo old. But I do have a feeling it won’t last long. The leather is pretty thin
customer_reviews.author: Ashely Draeger

customer_reviews.title: Fits in w all the family recliners
customer_reviews.text: Grandson Loves it and we do too. Everyone asks where we got it and how much... 2 friends have purchased after seeing ours.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Evans Miller

customer_reviews.title: Crooked
customer_reviews.text: Overall we like the chair, we bought it for our son. The only issue is that when it came and we put it together (which was super easy) it was crooked and the stabilizing piece that goes on the bottom was barely stapled on and fell off. So we had a replacement sent and that one showed up crooked as well, but my husband was able to kind of fix that one.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya

customer_reviews.title: Fun chair for the kid(s)!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old son love his chair and will sit in it when he watches his favorite shows or movies. It's made of good material and is easy to clean. The cup holder is large enough to hold any of his cup or snacks. It reclines and is easy to maneuver. The chair is not very heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this three years ago. Still in great condition. My now 4 year old still uses it and it is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love the color however this chair should say toddler chair it is so little for my 9yr old. The chair will not recline because she is to big.
customer_reviews.author: Mecka Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Idk what people are complaining about that its too small, unless your child is 4ft tall this works great! Matches are other furniture and my little girl sits in it all the time! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son (and everyone else) loves sitting in this chair! I bought the chair when my son was 1, he is now 2 and sits in it much more than he did. My stepdaughter, who turned 11 in July, is the one you find sitting in it the most. Super comfy, love the recliner aspect, really easy to clean and wasn't hard to put together at all! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my son as a Christmas gift and he loves it he always sits in it and let the recliner out and enjoy watching tv i love the color and the way it feels so smooth love it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great chair. Great quality. My kid loves this thing. This is his time-out chair. Tough life this kid has. They should just add additional holders on the other arm for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Tankus69

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old son loves this chair and he will probably fit into it till he's at least 5 or 6. My son is in the 95th percentile for height and weight. Easy to clean. Also, though it's large to last longer, it doesn't take up too much room. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute for my LO! I love that it reclines so he can just lay on it since he’s not ready to sit up without supper just yet! It was very easy to assemble, just needed to screw the legs on and that was it.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Nice for playroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 3 year old. She’s about to turn 4 and still fitting nicely. Nice material and cup holder. Glad we can wipe it down.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my 15 month old
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, easy to use and install. Don't know about wear and tear, seeing as we have only had for a week but, happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSlave

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided but good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I'm giving 4 stars is because the chair is lopsided and wiggles on the floor. Luckily my husband was able to rig it up so it doesn't wobble. We would've returned to get a new one but since it was before Christmas we wanted my daughter to have it on Christmas. Other than that it is a great purchase! Super soft, easy to clean material.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Poole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a new couch and loveseat for the adults in the house. These matched them perfectly and the kids love them. Even my two-year-old figured out how to pull out the foot rest and get in it reclined!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. My daughter loves it and loves watching TV and movies in it. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: britnie

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but no lever or handle to let chair back
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great chair, my daughter loves it. I just don’t like the fact that there is no handle to let the chair back. There is nothing to let it back or bring it back up
customer_reviews.author: Jalen Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Only came in easy to put together pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my grandkids....my daughter said the cloth ones they had were "gross" from food stains etc. so she threw then away These are vinyl and can be wiped if spills occur. Everyone is thrilled! Only came in easy to put together pieces!
customer_reviews.author: lucy zarfos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, shipping, and assembly!!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping with prime, super super easy to assemble, screw two legs on and snap the back into place. No rips tears or imperfections. So glad I got this for my goddaughter and another for her twin sister! Will def be getting another for my daughter when she's bigger! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Kids recliner
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this chair, but it won’t keep her reclined/will not hold the reclined position. 😕
customer_reviews.author: TeamWhatley

customer_reviews.title: Better than Pottery Barn! Can't beat the cup holder!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little chair! Very sturdy and true to color. Wipes down easily. My little guy loves the cup holder- makes him feel like such a big boy. So glad I purchased this one over the expensive cloth Pottery Barn chair! Would have been washing the cover every other day. Everyone who sees photos of our 1.5 year old in it love it and want to get one for their own child or grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: BustedStuff

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture Contemporary Brown LeatherSoft Kids Recliner with Cup Holder and Headrest
product_meta.description: Color:Brown LeathersoftKids will now be able to enjoy the comfort that adults experience with a recliner that was made just for them!The chair features an oversized headrest, plush upholstery and a cup holder in the arm to rest their drink during their favorite show or while reading a book. This sturdy little recliner has a solid hardwood frame and durable upholstery that cleans easily with a damp cloth. It has raised black plastic feet and will hold up to 90 pounds. Designed with safety in mind, it's filled with CA117 Fire retardant foam, and reclines only when a child is seated and the footrest is pulled out one inch.This cozy kids recliner will be a great addition to your living room or your child's bedroom or playroom. Single Unit Weight: 28.5 lbs Fixed Width: 24 Inches Minimum Depth: 21.500 Inches Maximum Depth: 36.500 Inches Fixed Height: 27 Inches Fixed Arm Height From Floor: 17 Inches Fixed Arm Height From Seat: 4 Inches Fixed Back Width: 18.5 Inches Fixed Back Height From Seat: 15 Inches Fixed Seat Width: 13.5 Inches Fixed Seat Depth: 11 Inches Fixed Seat Height: 15.5 Inches Seat Thickness: 2 Inches Weight Capacity: 90 lbs.
feature_bullets: Let your kids lounge around in a recliner that was designed specifically for them. An included cup holder keeps drinks from spilling, in case of spills the soft and durable LeatherSoft upholstery is easy to clean.
Juvenile recliner with footrest - perfectly sized for young kids and fur babies
Solid hardwood frame, plastic feet, 90 pound weight capacity.Spot clean with water based cleaner
Contemporary style kids chair for the playroom or living room
Product measurements : Overall Size: 24"W x 21.5-36.5"D x 27"H | Seat Size: 13.5"W x 11"D x 15.5"H | Back Size: 18.5"W x 15"H | Arm Size: 17"H from floor; 4"H from seat | Wall Clearance: 6"
